abstract: Ben Huh a 32-year-old entrepreneur who three years ago bought a blog devoted to silly cat pictures, I Can Has Cheezburger, has since expanded his unlikely Web empire to include 53 sites.
snippet: Ben Huh a 32-year-old entrepreneur who three years ago bought a blog devoted to silly cat pictures, I Can Has Cheezburger, has since expanded his unlikely Web empire to include 53 sites.
lead_paragraph: Three years ago Ben Huh visited a blog devoted to silly cat pictures — and saw vast potential.

headline.main: Once a Site of Funny Cat Pictures, Now a Web Empire
